channel.title: 1 Problem Shy of Perfexkt Server :\
channel.description: ok, i have a perfext server coded and i will not take full credit but i take 87% of it.. uhmm the problem that i am having.. i have a no-ip and evrything and i hve portforwarded my computer, but how do i make it so other players can play? the client is not a ip changer and i dont know how to program my ip into the client and source :\ please help? offering mod position. i dont know what files to edit to make it have my ip :\ please HELP?!?

item.title: 1 Problem Shy of Perfexkt Server :\
item.dc:creator: @freedom522 freedom522
item.description:
@freedom522 wrote:

yeah that one, unless you have a VPS then go there on the VPS, and to change the npc’s hp go to npc.cfg and it should be layed out like this.

//Updated: 17 May 2006 // NpcID NpcName combat health respawn npc = 19 White_Knight 5 25 30 npc = 20 Paladin 62 500 10 npc = 21 Hero 69 83 20

itll be spaced out differently, but you should get the point, combat level is first, health is second, and respawn time is third

Read full topic
